::KitKat/DarkMouse::

KitKat::
She looked at Megatron and transformed into wolf mode.  She looked at 
Rowdy one last time. Then back to Megatron. "AS you command."  She 
ran back headed back to the base.  While running back through the 
woods she taked to herself. "What is wrong with me.  I'm hearing 
voices from no where and telling Megatron to follow them? I must be 
loosing my logic circuits or something.  I'm going nuts, that's all 
there is to it. I'm loosing my mind.  I just got promoted and he'll 
demote me for sure."  she ran back to the base.

DarkMouse::
She sighed, and looked at the drone.  She was feeling better, but at 
teh same time, feeling useless.  She was a fighter and computer 
controller.  Sitting in her room, and it was spectacular compared to 
her last one, she still felt bad about not being able to fight yet.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron looked Kitkat up and down. He grew very bored with her 
antics 
> very quickly. "Both of you return to base now! we will settle it 
there. Here 
> were in the open."
>     Also, as insurence, he took out his tail gun and ignited the 
purple 
> plasma that fuled it. If Kitkat decided to bail, she was going to 
do it in 
> peices.
> 
>     Aracnia listened to Darkmouse and nodded. The Medical drone 
entered, 
> saluted, and began to run its programmed diagnostic on her. Aracnia 
would 
> later open the gym up for the mouse, it would allow her to warm her 
body up 
> for a battle if needed.
